name: Edemn
description:
Edemn is a fun and dynamic shooter about skeletons who have risen through ancient magic and now fight among themselves. The game is done in the style of games from the early 2000s, which creates a cool atmosphere to play





  • You will have to fight with other players, for the victory with different types of weapons. Each match in Edemn will be varied, and will drag on for a long time.



  • Each of which is unique, will diversify your game experience and add new abilities to your skeleton.



  • Can completely change the style of the game, each skin has a different ability, which distinguishes it from other skeletons.



  • Edemn will be adding new modes.
    Of the modes that are currently available, it's Deathmatсh
